listitem.para: All security updates issued for UCS 4.4-2 are included:

listitem.simpara: ghostscript (50507)
postgresql-common (2019-3466) (50506)
simplesamlphp (2019-3465) (50482)
subversion (50357)

listitem.para:
The following updated packages from Debian 9.11 are included (50559):
dpdk mediawiki pam-python redmine ruby-loofah symfony thunderbird

The following packages have been moved to the maintained repository of UCS:
novnc (35428) python-debtcollector (35428) python-oslo.config (35428) python-oslo.i18n (35428) python-rfc3986 (35428) python-wrapt (35428) stevedore (35428) univention-ipcalc (49135) websockify (35428)

listitem.simpara: The package univention-licence now uses dh_python2 instead of python-support. Therefore Python modules are installed into /usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/univention/ (49137).
The package univention-doc now uses dh_python2 instead of python-support (49131).
Depending on database memory layout it could happen, that the OpenLDAP server process slapd failed to restart because it incurred a bus error (49780).
Update of LMDB to version from Debian 10 (Buster), which fixes several internal cursor handling problems (47587).
Remove unused file memcached_univention-directory-listener.conf (48139).
Add missing &ucsUCR; header to run script (50110).
Remove legacy code using DB3 database (50407).
Migrate Python code from python-support to dh_python2 (49146).
Explicitly close second database cursor when deleting cache entries (47587).
Progress bars were jumping up and down when the info text changed and the number of lines were different (33590).
The package univention-directory-manager-modules now uses dh_python2 instead of python-support. Therefore Python modules are installed into /usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/univention/admin/ (49147).

The package univention-server-overview now uses dh_python2 instead of python-support. Therefore Python modules are installed into /usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/univention/management/console/modules/ (49164, 49161).
The UMC for UCS Core Editions shows a dialog that informs about the Univention Summit 2020 (50530).
The development package now uses a file from the translation package univention-ucs-translation-template instead of using its own mechanism for generating translation files (50341).
The LDAP service is not restarted anymore on every change of the attribute univentionService for any computer object in the domain (47706).
The package univention-appcenter now uses dh_python2 instead of python-support. Therefore Python modules are installed into /usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/univention/management/console/ (49161).
The package univention-app-appliance now uses dh_python2 instead of python-support. Therefore Python modules are installed into /usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/univention/app_appliance/ (49128).
Better error message are shown in case the LDAP schema registration fails (50481).
Added version check for global App Center (50450).
The package univention-appcenter now uses dh_python2 instead of python-support (50425).
Use univention-l10n-build to build localization files for univention-appcenter (50340, 49161).
InitialValue of App Settings is now working for settings with a defined scope of outside (50203).

section.title: &ucsUDM; UMC modules and command line interface

listitem.simpara: Fix regression from 349, which could lead to a Python traceback during &ucsUDM; hook import (50495).
Prevent TypeError during logging of invalid date values in the UDM REST service (50476).
A link to a support article for printer driver distribution is now shown in the UMC printers module (50376).
The package univention-directory-manager-modules now uses dh_python2 instead of python-support. Therefore Python modules are installed into /usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/univention/admin/ (49147).

Fix regression from 348, which could lead to a Python traceback during UDM module import, in cases where modules had been installed under the legacy path /usr/share/pyshared, like e.g. the mailquota module (50493).
The gidNumber and sambaPrimaryGroupSID of users/user is now set during the object creation instead of setting it afterwards (50161).
Searching for the IP address property of computer objects now also searches for IPv6 addresses (49313).
The properties allowedEmailUsers and allowedEmailGroups of groups/group and mail/lists have been added to the UDM module mapping (50239).
Some code cleanup in the UDM users/user filter for disabled and locked properties has been done (50236).
The DHCP assignment for computers with multiple MAC addresses has been repaired (44937).
The logging and error handling when removing child objects has been improved (50288).

section.title: Modules for system settings / setup wizard

listitem.simpara: The package univention-management-console-module-ipchange now uses dh_python2 instead of python-support. Therefore Python modules are installed into /usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/univention/management/console/modules/ ^(49152, 49161).
A warning is shown if the minimum RAM requirements to install UCS are not met (50448).

The package univention-system-setup now uses dh_python2 instead of python-support. Therefore Python modules are installed into /usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/univention/management/console/modules/ (49142).
The new tool univention-fetch-certificate is used during join (45115).

The package univention-join now uses dh_python2 instead of python-support. Therefore Python modules are installed into /usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/univention/management/console/modules/ (49149, 49161).
Automatically apply the &ucsMaster; settings of the &ucsUCRV;s ldap/database/mdb/maxsize and listener/cache/mdb/maxsize on &ucsBackup; and &ucsSlave; systems during the join (50114).
The package univention-directory-reports now uses dh_python2 instead of python-support. Therefore Python modules are installed into /usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/univention/directory/ (49148).
Fixed an error while loading the System Activation Wizard (50267).
A broken test for filesystem permissions has been removed (50394).

The package univention-management-console-module-diagnostic now uses dh_python2 instead of python-support. Therefore Python modules are installed into /usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/univention/management/console/modules/ (49151).

The package univention-management-console-module-top now uses dh_python2 instead of python-support. Therefore Python modules are installed into /usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/univention/management/console/modules/ (49158).
The package univention-policy now uses dh_python2 instead of python-support. Therefore Python modules are installed into /usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/univention/lib/ (49138).

The package univention-quota now uses dh_python2 instead of python-support. Therefore Python modules are installed into /usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/univention/management/console/modules/ (49141).

The package univention-management-console-module-ucr now uses dh_python2 instead of python-support. Therefore Python modules are installed into /usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/univention/management/console/modules/ (49159).

The package univention-system-info now uses dh_python2 instead of python-support. Therefore Python modules are installed into /usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/univention/management/console/modules/ (49165).
The package ships the directory /usr/share/univention-management-console-module-udm/ again. This is necessary for creation of reports and has been broken in 346 (50497).
UDM handlers are now able to display help texts in their UMC module (50376).

The package univention-management-console-module-udm now uses dh_python2 instead of python-support. Therefore Python modules are installed into /usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/univention/management/console/modules/ (49160).

The package univention-management-console-module-mrtg now uses dh_python2 instead of python-support. Therefore Python modules are installed into /usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/univention/management/console/modules/ (49154, 49161).

The package univention-management-console-module-lib now uses dh_python2 instead of python-support. Therefore Python modules are installed into /usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/univention/management/console/modules/ (49153, 49161).
The listener module ldap_extension now stores success or error messages in a new LDAP attribute univentionListenerMessage. These are used in the App center to improve error messages (50481).
The objectClass top is now automatically added to the container cn=dns,$LDAP_BASE, when the LDAP is initially provisioned. Existing systems are not modified (46649).
Added set/get_handler_message to store/get listener messages in the LDAP directory (as settings data object) (50481).
Remove deprecated module univention.lib.umc_connection (47205).

The package univention-updater now uses dh_python2 instead of python-support. Therefore Python modules are installed into /usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/univention/updater/ and /usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/univention/management/console/modules/updater/ (49143).
Added file daemon.json for dockerd parameters (50295).

It is now possible to make the SAML Identity Provider accessible under multiple URL sub-paths, each with its own entityID but with the same configuration. This has been added to use the SAML Identity Provider with multiple Azure domains (50510).
The UDM modules saml/idpconfig and saml/serviceprovider have been modernized (50345).
The package univention-saml now uses dh_python2 instead of python-support. Therefore Python modules are installed into /usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/univention/admin/handlers/ (49167).
Is is now possible to restrict negotiate authentication to certain IP networks via the &ucsUCRV; saml/idp/negotiate/filter-subnets (49485).

The package univention-self-service now uses dh_python2 instead of python-support. Therefore Python modules are installed into /usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/univention/management/console/modules/ (49163).
The LDAP ACLs have been improved to allow &ucsUAS; users to use the self service feature (50037).
The package univention-mail-dovecot now uses dh_python2 instead of python-support. Therefore Python modules are installed into /usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/univention/mail/ (49144).
Improve Nagios check for nscd to check for a working nscd by querying its statistics data (49967).

A new package univention-apache-vhost has been added. It is installed by default and ships a &ucsUCR; template to hold virtual hosts for Apache beyond the default ones. A new tool univention-add-vhost has been added to add (and remove) these virtual hosts (45115).

If the service Wildcard Certificate is added to a host, a wildcard certificate for that host is created (*.$fqhn) on the &ucsMaster;. A new tool univention-fetch-certificate has been added to simplify the download of certificates from the &ucsMaster; (45115).
Repaired firewall rules regarding docker networks getting broken after a restart of the firewall (50088).

The package univention-management-console-module-services now uses dh_python2 instead of python-support. Therefore Python modules are installed into /usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/univention/uvmm/ (49157, 49161).

The package univention-management-console-module-reboot now uses dh_python2 instead of python-support. Therefore Python modules are installed into /usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/univention/uvmm/ (49156, 49161).

The package univention-virtual-machine-manager-daemon now uses dh_python2 instead of python-support. Therefore Python modules are installed into /usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/univention/uvmm/ (49179).
Allow to migrate VMs again after failure (50092).

The package univention-virtual-machine-manager-schema now uses dh_python2 instead of python-support. Therefore Python modules are installed into /usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/univention/admin/ (49181).
The package novnc from Debian Buster is now used (35428).
The package univention-virtual-machine-manager-node has been prepared for Python 3 (49180).
Samba does not recognizing Unix SIDs as valid. This causes Microsoft Windows explorer to crash when opening the security tab on a share or file where such SIDs are present in the ACLs (49747).

The package univention-management-console-module-adtakeover now uses dh_python2 instead of python-support. Therefore Python modules are installed into /usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/univention/management/console/modules/ (49150).
Recreating user and group objects which have been deleted before used to cause rejects in &ucsUAS; (49792).
Time conversion of the attribute accountExpires/userexpiry has been fixed to prevent a loop in the &ucsS4C; which incremented userexpiry on certain timezones (50202).
Renamed DNS records are now correctly removed from Samba/AD when the object in UCS was renamed (49728).
DNS host records without IP addresses are now synchronized to Samba/AD (49874).
The UDM modules container/msgpo, settings/msprintconnectionpolicy and settings/mswmifilter have been modernized (50342).
The use of the function normalise_userAccountControl() has been replaced in mapping.py with a static mapping (50305).
Detection of equal DN's when moving objects has been enhanced (49976).
Error handling for already removed objects has been improved (49876).
Logging of UDM related debug messages has been improved. This can be controlled by the &ucsUCRV; connector/debug/udm/level (43096).
Removal of GPOs in Samba does not cause a reject anymore. When objects are removed where the parent object is already removed the removal now succeeds (49324).
Add documentation for .univention-l10n format (50521).
univention-l10n-build now runs without any UCS dependency and recognizes UMC .po files (50341).
